thread.title: Shirley has a shocking plan to keep Mick out of jail in EastEnders | Metro News
thread.title_full: Shirley has a shocking plan to keep Mick out of jail in EastEnders | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Shirley has a shocking plan to keep Mick out of jail in EastEnders | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 28 Feb 2017 12:01 am (Picture: BBC) 
Shirley Carter will do anything to help her son Mick in his hour of need in EastEnders – and she is about to take drastic action to ensure that he won’t end up behind bars. But will Mick discover her plan – and will he try and stop her? 
Mick is giving up hope over the future of the Queen Vic and yet more bad news pushes him to hit the bottle. Despairing at the prospect of losing the business and also of ending up behind bars if he can’t pay the fine, it’s fair to say that Mick is at rock bottom and Shirley hates seeing him like this. 
Later, Mick gets an unexpected offer which could keep him out of jail but he stuns his family when he refuses, prompting Shirley to come up with a shocking plan. (Picture: BBC) 
As Johnny puts pressure on his dad to come clean to Linda about how much trouble they’re in, Shirley sets the ball rolling on her idea. 
But just what has Shirley got up her sleeve – and will Mick be able to talk her out of it? 
One to watch: Friday 10th March at 8pm on BBC One. Metro Blogs is a place for opinions. These opinions belong to the author and are not necessarily shared by Metro. More
